p: M. foetida have been reported to contain secondary metabolites such as sitosterylglucoside, 5,25-stigmastadien-3β-ylglucoside, and 1β-hydroxyfriedel-6-en-3-one, and a lot of cucurbitane-type triterpenoid derivatives ( Molehin and Adefegha, 2014). Phenolic glycosides of M. foetida include eriodictyol-, kaempferol- 5,7,4′-trihydroxyflavanone, and 5,7-dihydroxychromone-7- O- β-D-glucopyranoside ( Froelich et al., 2007).
